FREELANCE WEBSITE DESIGNER

SUMMARY

Marine Corps trained leader and business development specialist.
With an extensive background in many facets throughout the operational side of a business, I always seek out ways to assist and improve my teams training and overall performance.
I have in 12+ years of experience in website development, internet research and seo, 4 years experience in purchasing, training, and supply chain control for the military, 15+ years in b2b/b2c sales, business loan brokering, and real estate investment training.
I bring with me an impeccable work ethic, thanks to my time in the Marines, to ensure an exemplary outcome to all goals that my position requires.

EXPERIENCE

Company Name
City ,

09/2012 to Current
Specialized in cold calls to business owners looking for a web designer or online marketing manager for their businesses online presence and marketing necessities.
Focused on sales for websites, and website development, logo designs, and online marketing services/materials on a remote independent contractor for hire basis.
Cross selling of widget applications and installation assistance for current and newly designed websites, with tracking links for lead development and follow up.
Sales and creation of ads, back links, marketing promotions on sites such as Twitter, Facebook, and Foursquare, and consistently generating new ideas to ensure above average marketing results.
Over 10 years experience with internet based web designing, marketing, SEO, PPC, social media networks, and analytic research, as well online presentations, web research, email response handling and customer support.

Created and sent out mass marketing campaigns via email, social media, LinkedIn, and newsletter distribution.
Developed ongoing business ­ supplier relationships on a daily basis for the securing of future requirements.

Created professional relationships with lending institutions in order to accelerate the processing of the applications in a swift and efficient manner.
Utilized proper demographic research in order to establish a target market for the promotions that certain financial institutions we lending for.
Established a working network of lenders and brokers for lending submission through internet applications.
Follow up calls for renewing loans and cross selling of additional products for the continuing relationship with current and past business owners and clients.

Collection responsibilities for outstanding balances owed on unpaid tuition's, Collections for my department (9 reps) in 2006 reached over $32 million.
Traveled extensively to for presenting materials to students of higher level trainings in order to ensure up sells from current training and membership programs.
Advising on all aspects of investment deals such as foreclosure, wholesale, lease options, owner financed, rentals, mobile homes, land development, for sale by owners, new construction, and rehabs.

Resolved wide range of customer problems, applying diplomacy and assertiveness to fee and budget discrepancies.
Management of SABRS (Standards Account Budgeting Reports System) Contract procurement of $350k annually.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Production Supervisor

Location: Springfield, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
EnerSys is the global leader in stored energy solutions for industrial applications. We have over thirty manufacturing and assembly plants worldwide servicing over 10,000 customers in more than 100 countries. Worldwide headquarters are located in Reading, PA, USA with regional headquarters in Europe and Asia. We complement our extensive line of Motive Power and Energy Systems with a full range of integrated services and systems. With sales and service locations throughout the world, and over 100 years of battery experience, EnerSys is the power/full solution for stored DC power products.

Job Purpose

Learn More About Our Company

Working as a critical leader within a production team, support the achievement of set production targets and customer expectations by providing the appropriate level of leadership, supervision, and training/development to the people assigned within your shift and/or department, as well as the expected level of oversight to the equipment, systems, resources, and facilities under your control. Ensure those under your supervision are following standard operating procedures with continual focus to their personal safety and the safety of their co-workers, and the quality of product produced being the guiding principles of the teams’ behaviors and actions.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

 Provide the appropriate level of leadership, supervision, and training/development to the people assigned within your shift and/or department.  Provide the expected level of oversight to the equipment, systems, resources, and facilities under your control.  Understand, and effectively communicate expected department targets, to include, but not limited to production, safety, quality, cost control and operational excellence levels (KPIs). Monitoring as appropriate and providing instruction and counsel to employee(s) when expectations are not being met and provide recognition when set expectations are exceeded.  Establishing work schedules and managing to planned and unplanned employee levels, providing hands-on coverage as needed, providing for, and making request of appropriate levels of support, supply and materials, and utilizing the manufacturing resource planning (MRP) systems to timely communicate production data.  Be an active liaison to other departments/shifts to ensure proper transfer of information to production status and other key performance areas. Establishing effective relationships and channels of communications to immediate and next level of production management, maintenance, supply chain management, EH&S, and HR.  Ensure compliance, for yourself and all whom you may come into contact, in all safety, environment and health processes and procedures. To include but not limited to wearing required personal protective equipment (PPE), maintaining, and safely storing PPE, and submitting to periodic personal testing and monitoring. 

Qualifications

 High School Diploma or GED equivalent, plus 2-year technical/associates degree or certification accompanied with no less than 1 year of work experience in a lead, project manager, or supervisory role. Or equivalent combination of education and experience. A bachelor’s degree in science, production management, business management, and/or engineering, with relevant work experience within a fast-paced heavy materials, system-controlled machine and process driven work environment is preferred.  A high level of self-motivation, the ability to coach others, and the agility and influence to effectively maintain the needed level of motivation within the team to achieve, if not exceed, performance expectations.  Ability to associate cause and affect relationships and determine patterns of activity in anticipation of change within operations, processes, systems, and personnel on a continual and consistent basis.  Displayed ability to do basic math – addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and calculating percentages – with a high degree of accuracy  Fluent verbal and written skills in English. Strong communication skills, with ability to efficiently present a situation and effectively advocate for a position to any level of the organization  Displayed ability to read and write for understanding, interpret instructions and standard operating procedures, work within software programs (such as but not limited to Excel, Word, Outlook, and PowerPoint) and business specific resource planning and reporting systems  Ability to be qualified for safe and compliant use and maintenance of assigned and required Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) and blood lead level screenings. To include a fit-tested respirator, steel-toed shoes, safety eye wear and hearing protection. 

General Job Requirements

Generic

EnerSys provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. EEO/Minority/Female/Vets/Disabled

Know Your Rights

Know Your Rights (Spanish)

EEO is the Law Supplement

Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
